Kingston Township is one of nineteen townships in DeKalb County, Illinois, USA.  As of the 2020 census, its population was 3,492 and it contained 1,315 housing units.
Geography
According to the 2021 census gazetteer files, Kingston Township has a total area of , of which  (or 99.01%) is land and  (or 0.99%) is water.
Cities, towns, villages
* Genoa (partial)
* Kingston
* Kirkland (partial)
Unincorporated towns
* Colvin Park at
Cemeteries
* Kingston
* Lanan
* North Kingston
* Vanderburgh
